input_text:
Job Title: Customer Care Representative

Location: Charlotte, NC

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Customer Service, Management, Marketing

Description:
LOOKING FOR IMMEDIATE HIRES
Interested in starting a new long-term career in face-to-face marketing? Get started with # today! We are a team of entrepreneurs expanding from Atlanta with the goal to UNLOCK Charlotte as a market!
If so, you're in the right place! At # , we pride ourselves on developing leaders and building them into the career that they once dreamed of.
JOB OVERVIEW:
This position takes a very hands-on approach to the marketing field. If you are hired on, you'll be able to hop into business development and marketing as soon as yesterday! Essential and transferrable skills such as interviewing, training, recruiting are taught and mastered within no time.
As a member of the team here at #, you'll be able to immediately start to develop and run campaigns for our multi-million dollar clients. We use a unique, direct approach to marketing our clients and develop a personal relationship with our customers since we believe in the power of a handshake. We partner up with shopping centers all around the city and run small events for our massive client portfolio every day! If this sounds like the position for you, we want to hear from you!
JOB RESPONSIBILITIES:
-Be a part of team training atmospheres, learning every single day and sharpening to master skills
-Learn and retain brand knowledge for our clients and be able to articulate them to the customers
-Talk to a huge number of people at small marketing events throughout the city every day
-Use our marketing strategies to acquire quality customers on a daily basis
-Create personal relationships with customers so we can maintain quality
-Report accurate data to clients and the management
-Be able to stand for long hours at the events
EXCITING BENEFITS:
-Fun work environment!
-Opportunity to travel around the country via business trips!
-Tons of diversity in the office!
-A bunch of chances for bonuses and extra compensation!
-Trained to run a multimillion-dollar business!
-Fun and eccentric social events, including team nights every week!
-The best mentors and coaches in the industry are right at your fingertips!
IDEAL QUALITIES:
-Solid communication skills
-The drive to get better every day
-Super outgoing and fun personality
-200% work ethic
-Be very coachable
-Ready to start a career
-Love people more than anything else
If you want to work hard, and want to have the most fun at the same time, then APPLY TODAY!
(No experience required, training starts the first day)
Job Type: Full-time
Pay: $35,456.00 - $56,712.00 per year

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
